  1. ADOPTED 2023-2024 TAX RATE

    THE CITY OF SEABROOK ADOPTED A TAX RATE THAT WILL RAISE MORE TAXES FOR MAINTENANCE AND OPERATIONS THAN LAST YEAR'S TAX RATE. THE TAX RATE WILL EFFECTIVELY BE RAISE BY 2.50 PERCENT AND WILL RAISE TAXES FOR MAINTENANCE AND OPERATIONS ON A $100,000 HOME BY APPROXIMATELY $-4.38. Learn more about the City of Seabrook's budget and financials.

SeabrookAlerts

SeabrookAlerts is the official emergency alert and notification system for the City of Seabrook. It is a free service that sends timely and reliable information to the public during emergencies.

Click here to sign up today.
